name: Claustrophobic Highway
description:
Claustrophobic Highway

[DISCLAIMER: PLAY IN FULL SCREEN]

The game was made in 2 days, for the Ben Bonk Jam #2 with the theme of "Limited Space".

You're on a Highway with lots of cars around you. You need to avoid cars around you while trying to travel the furthest distance possible.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys To move the car around.

Space (when behind a car) to honk at them and  make them go faster (to maneuver around them)

You need to keep moving (to reach the checkpoints) or you will run out of time and lose.

Everything was made by our team in the game during the time limit from the scripts, art & music except the skybox which is a free asset in the Unity Asset Store.

Made By,

Programmers: Micnasr, RaideNnigth

Art and Music: xXx_T0SHIII_xXx
